By the way, MW3 really hates Windows XP.  It was crashing constantly for me until I updated to the very latest Microsoft .NET Framework.  It will also crash if you have bad RAM.

BTW, there are registry hacks for hidden resolutions up to 1600x1200.  I've tried them and they work perfectly with the known downside that you can't hit escape to use the game menu while in the middle of a mission, as it will CTD.

1024x768 Failsafe to return to normal settings:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MicroProse\MechWarrior 3\1.0]
"InGameVMode"=dword:00000007

1152 x 864 resolution

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MicroProse\MechWarrior 3\1.0]
"InGameVMode"=dword:00000008

1280 x 1024 resolution

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MicroProse\MechWarrior 3\1.0]
"InGameVMode"=dword:00000009

1600 x 1200 resolution

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MicroProse\MechWarrior 3\1.0]
"InGameVMode"=dword:0000000a
